this_title: Shania Twain Still The One Live From Vegas 2012
trans_title: 仙妮亚.唐恩 你始终是我爱的唯一 2012拉斯维加斯演唱会
introduction: 十分精彩的演唱会，加拿大乡村音乐天后。经典级别演唱会，除了歌手的歌十分容易入耳，演唱会分了几个十分明显的配合布景，也充分把拉斯维加斯舞台的深度充分利用，也把舞台的机械化做到极致。一开场的皮夹诱惑，骑着摩托车从天而降。起码出场，是美国西部风味的酒吧。然后是豹女郎。。。然后篝火晚会，还邀请现场观众上台。。。。服装特色而且华丽。没有固定的乐手位置，基本都是机动的。和唱更是经常出现在前台和她一起。特别的是应该是一对双胞胎男和唱歌手。整场演唱会悦耳动听。01. Opening02. I'm gonna getcha good!03. You win my love04. Don't be stupid (You know I love you)05. Up!06. The good, the bad and the sexy07. I ain't no quitter08. No one needs to know09. Whose bed have your boots been under?10. Any man of mine11. Shania Style (Interlude)12. That don't impress me much13. Honey, I'm home14. (If you're not in it for love) I'm outta here15. Shania Memories (Interlude)16. Carrie Anne17. Come on over18. Love gets me every time19. Rock this country!20. Today is your day21. Black Horse, White Horse (Interlude)22. You're still the one23. From this moment on24. Red storm25. Man! I feel like a woman26. Rock this country! (Live from Calgary)
chinese_title: 仙妮亚.唐恩 你始终是我爱的唯一 2012拉斯维加斯演唱会
foreign_title: Shania Twain Still The One Live From Vegas 2012
